entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
